brainly_data.question:
Which is a structural factor that can affect flexibility?
a. age
b. circadian rhythm
c. gender
d. joint anatomy
brainly_data.subject: Health

all_answers.question:
Which is a structural factor that can affect flexibility?
a. age
b. circadian rhythm
c. gender
d. joint anatomy
all_answers.subject: Health
all_answers.text: Age because as you get older, your bones get more and more tired and weaker, causing them to feel more pain when trying to be flexible.
